ctu_text: The eligible families under the Food Security Act and the eligible families of the Socio-Economic Census 2011 are already benefited under the scheme. Hence they do not require registration. \n1. It will be necessary for the beneficiary to register on the [registration portal or ](https://chiranjeevi.

ctu_text: The application for registration in the scheme of contract workers will be verified online by the nodal officer of the concerned department and will be updated regularly. \n1. Small and marginal farmers who are not linked with Jan Aadhaar card, they will be able to get the seeding of land holding done in Jan Aadhaar card as per the prescribed procedure on Jan Aadhaar portal through E-Mitra. After seeding, the family can be registered on the above mentioned registration portal of the scheme itself through online/e-mitra.
